doc.field: The bulk of this accretion consists of materials created or collected by Fitch's friends and colleagues in an effort to commemorate his life and work. Materials include correspondence and pamphlets from Fitch's memorial service, with most of the correspondence consisting of emails sent between Jane LaTour and Fitch's former coworkers, family, and friends. Also included are materials regarding the first five annual Robert Fitch memorial lectures held at LaGuardia Community College from 2012 and 2016. The accretion also includes articles about the release of Fitch's book The Assassination of New York as an e-book in 2014, as well as a transcript of a lecture he gave at the Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Archives in 1999.
